ch0247_80_dande/0101_0701_01_10:
I was waiting for you,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]! Thanks for coming!
ch0247_80_dande/0101_0701_02_10:
Right then, let’s go! Time to enjoy another day of
all-day battling!
ch0247_80_dande/7101_0701_01_10:
My dream is to help Galar’s Trainers be as strong
as they can be.
ch0247_80_dande/7101_0701_02_10:
I’ve been thinking about whether there’s anything
I can do to make that dream come true.
ch0247_80_dande/7101_0701_03_10:
If you’ve got any good ideas, I’d love to
hear ’em!
ch0247_80_dande/7102_0701_01_10:
Everyone’s so surprised when they see me wearing
something different.
ch0247_80_dande/7102_0701_02_10:
They know I don’t wear the same outfit every
day—right? I mean, is it really that shocking?
ch0247_80_dande/7103_0701_01_10:
It’s not easy to come up with a battle strategy
that works against any opponent.
ch0247_80_dande/7103_0701_02_10:
But if everyone out there DID use a strategy
like that...
ch0247_80_dande/7103_0701_03_10:
things would be a lot more interesting,
wouldn’t they?
ch0247_80_dande/7104_0701_01_10:
What do you think of my outfit? Don’t I give off a
completely different impression?
ch0247_80_dande/7104_0701_02_10:
Sometimes I want to get away from battling in a
flashy, crowd-pleasing style and just focus on
solid fundamentals.
ch0247_80_dande/7104_0701_03_10: I changed my outfit to match my battle style.
ch0247_80_dande/7105_0701_01_10:
Maybe I ought to put myself into the mindset
of a Trainer who’s just starting out... Like
you, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0247_80_dande/7105_0701_02_10:
I’m not saying I want to throw away everything I
am now.
ch0247_80_dande/7105_0701_03_10:
I just want to make new discoveries and go
even further!
ch0247_80_dande/1701_0701_01_10:
I’ve got something for you! I’d love for you to
take it.
ch0247_80_dande/1701_0702_01_10:
Make the most of items and get stronger
and stronger!
ch0247_80_dande/2501_0701_01_10:
As I interact with you and the other
sync pairs each day, I often feel...
ch0247_80_dande/2501_0701_02_10: that I still have a lot of growing to do.
ch0247_80_dande/2501_0701_03_10:
I never thought, at this point, I’d be psyching
myself up—saying “I know I can still do more”!
ch0247_80_dande/2501_0702_01_10: I don’t think I’ll ever truly feel satisfied.
ch0247_80_dande/2501_0702_02_10:
For instance, even if I were standing at the very
top, above all other Trainers...
ch0247_80_dande/2501_0702_03_10:
I’d still be competing against myself, trying to
reach even higher!
ch0247_80_dande/2511_0701_02_10:
When I was just a Trainer, the chairman endorsed
me for the Gym Challenge.
ch0247_80_dande/2511_0701_03_10:
If not for Chairman Rose, there may have never
been a Champion Leon.
ch0247_80_dande/2511_0702_01_10:
Chairman Rose was thinking much farther into the
future than the rest of us.
ch0247_80_dande/2511_0702_02_10:
That’s why, even though it seemed like he was
headed toward the same future as us, he ended
up going off in his own direction...
ch0247_80_dande/2511_0702_03_10:
Next time, I hope we’ll move toward a bright
future we all want.
ch0247_80_dande/3001_0701_01_10:
Morning! Don’t forget to recharge so you can
battle your best!
ch0247_80_dande/3003_0701_01_10:
Once you’ve experienced the heat of a stadium
that’s fired up, you won’t forget it!
ch0247_80_dande/3005_0701_01_10:
Good job today. It’s very important to have time to
rest your heart and soul.
